hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="golang" published_version="1.9.2"
available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) PRETTY_NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.9 (Santiago)"
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo for $PRETTY_NAME." echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi export WORK_DIR=`pwd` cd $WORK_DIR echo $WORK_DIR
#Install dependencies sudo yum install -y tar wget gcc
# Added only in jenkins jobs..not mentioned in the recipe sudo yum install -y which
#To install Go 1.9.2 for everyone's use on a system mkdir go_for_everyones_use cd go_for_everyones_use wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz export orig_path=$PATH export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin cd /usr/bin sudo ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc
echo "Go version for everyone's use" which go go version | grep 1.9.2
# Unset PATH for removing /usr/local/go/bin/go export PATH=$orig_path
cd $WORK_DIR
mkdir go_for_private_use cd go_for_private_use wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz tar -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz
export PATH=$PATH:$PWD/go/bin export GOROOT=$WORK_DIR/go_for_private_use/go export CC=gcc which go go version | grep 1.9.2
